alert.note: Alert for Foard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 04 at 7:37PM CDT until October 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Texas, including the following counties, Archer, Baylor, Foard and Knox. * WHEN...Until 845 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 735 PM CDT, Minor flooding from earlier heavy rain is still possible. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of one-quarter inch to 1 inch are possible before rain ends later this evening. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Seymour, Archer City, Munday, Knox City, Benjamin, Holliday, Scotland, Windthorst, Goree, Megargel, Mabelle, Lake Kemp, Red Springs, Bomarton, Westover, Lake Diversion, Vera, Dundee, Lake Kickapoo and Rhineland. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
